title: [BUG] [SPRING] incorrect generation of add*Item methods for List-fields in 6.5.0
description:
Description

Migrating from 6.2.1 to 6.5.0 we run into an issue with list fields which might be defined as

AdditionalProperties:
  properties:
    additional_properties:
      type: array
      default: []
      items:
        type: string

The generator will generate a add a addAdditionalPropertiesItem method wich is wrong:

public AdditionalProperties addAdditionalPropertiesItem(String additionalPropertiesItem) {
if (this.additionalProperties == null) {
this.additionalProperties = null; // here is the bug
}
this.additionalProperties.add(additionalPropertiesItem);
return this;
}

openapi-generator version

6.5.0 (maven plugin)

OpenAPI declaration file content or url

see above

Generation Details
Steps to reproduce
Related issues/PRs
Suggest a fix
